column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////I never quite understood the ramen craze
column2: but I totally get it now. I grew up eating Top Ramen and Cup Noodles
column3: so the idea of paying more than $.50 for a bowl of ramen seemed like a scam. Despite my apprehension
column4: I gave ramen a shot while on a trip to Honolulu a few years back. Conclusion: Hated it. Why overcomplicate this beloved middle-class delicacy? Â
